name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Go Engineer with over 10 years of experience specializing in Linux-based environments and containerized applications. Proficient in **Golang** and experienced with **Kubernetes**, **KVM**, **QEMU**, and **libvirt**, enabling the development and management of scalable, efficient cloud-native systems. Strong expertise in version control using **git** and adept at debugging and resolving software bugs, ensuring high-quality software delivery.
Skilled in building robust software solutions with a solid foundation in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, and frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Demonstrated track record of leading enterprise platform development, integrating AI/ML capabilities, and ensuring compliance with standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. Committed to delivering maintainable solutions that drive significant real-world impact.
